code: import React from"react";import"../../../../Styles/Style.css";var RenderMovieList=function RenderMovieList(event,api){//storing the event var searchField=event.target.value;// storing the URL for searching movies var movieSearch="https://api.themoviedb.org/3/search/movie?api_key="+api+"&language=en-US&query="+searchField+"&page=1&include_adult=false";// creating my promise var promise=new Promise(function(resolve,reject){var catchData=fetch(movieSearch);resolve(catchData);});// converting the data to json data promise.then(function(response){return response.json();})//converting the data to a object .then(function(data){console.log(data);// grabbed the div tag from the Movie.js var movieDiv=document.getElementById("movieDiv");movieDiv.innerHTML="";// movieDiv.innerHTML="" // create p tag for movie over view var movieOverView=document.createElement("p");movieOverView.innerHTML="";// create p tag for movie title var movieTilte=document.createElement("p");movieTilte.innerHTML="";var movieImage=document.createElement("img");var movieReleaseDate=document.createElement("p");// filter through the list of objects var filteredMovieData=data.results.filter(function(movie){return movie.title===searchField;});// printing off the list of objects filteredMovieData.forEach(function(movie){movieImage.setAttribute("src","https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w300/"+movie.poster_path);movieImage.setAttribute("alt","Sorry, there are problems with the image");movieTilte.innerHTML="Title: "+movie.title;movieOverView.innerHTML="Movie Overview: "+movie.overview;movieReleaseDate.innerHTML=" Released: "+movie.release_date+"";movieDiv.appendChild(movieTilte);movieDiv.appendChild(movieOverView);movieDiv.appendChild(movieImage);movieDiv.appendChild(movieReleaseDate);movieDiv.setAttribute("class","cardBody");console.log(movieTilte);console.log(movieOverView);new Promise(function(resolve,reject){var actorData=fetch("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/"+movie.id+"/credits?api_key="+api);resolve(actorData);}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){data.cast.forEach(function(data){var actorDiv=document.createElement("div");actorDiv.setAttribute("class","actorCard");var actorP=document.createElement("p");var actorRole=document.createElement("p");var actorPicture=document.createElement("img");actorPicture.setAttribute("src","https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w300/"+data.profile_path);actorRole.innerHTML="Role: "+data.character;actorP.innerHTML="Crew: "+data.name;movieDiv.appendChild(actorDiv);actorDiv.appendChild(actorP);actorDiv.appendChild(actorRole);actorDiv.appendChild(actorPicture);console.log(data);});});});});};export default RenderMovieList;
